description:
Breathable, comfortable, and colourful, everything a great sock should be. From the campground to the playground, the Quest socks will keep your little explorer’s feet happy. Made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend that dries quickly, wears well, and shines on the trail.

  • Made of merino wool, nylon, and Lycra
  • Targeted cushioning underfoot, atop the ankle, and up the Achilles providing comfort without bulk
  • Lightweight wool yarn in a ribbed performance knit with seamless construction ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters
  • 1/4 height rises about 10cm above the base of your heel and shows 5cm above your average low hiking boots
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Quest 1/4 Lightweight Socks - Children to Youths
